create.alreadyRegistered: You already have a registered wallet. Click the login button below to log in.
create.error: Error during registration, please try again

new.create: Use biometrics to prove you're not a robot

sso.description:
Before continuing, please make sure you are using a device that belongs to you.
Frak is a solution allowing {{productName}} to reward its community for the help provided in promoting its offers. Frak is a decentralized and open-source solution, which does not store any personal or biometric data.
To learn more about {{productName}}, please review our Privacy Policy and Terms of Use.
sso.redirect: You will be redirected to {{ productName }} in a few seconds.
sso.subTitle: to immediately receive your winnings from <pLink>{{productName}}</pLink>.
sso.title: Create your wallet

default.title: Success
default.description: You've successfully completed all the steps.
default.description_sharing: Your wallet has been created to receive your **{{ productName }}** reward for sharing. To find your wallet, go to [wallet.frak.id](https://wallet.frak.id).
default.description_reward: Check your earnings at any time on [wallet.frak.id](https://wallet.frak.id). You too can share with your friends, all your shares that lead to clicks, registrations or purchases generate new earnings!

default.description: Login to your Frak account to get the best experience on **{{ productName }}**
default.description_sharing: {{ productName }} pays you directly on your **wallet** for the value you create if your shares lead to actions such as clicks, registrations or purchases.
default.description_reward: {{ productName }} pays you directly into your **wallets** for the value you create through actions on this site, such as clicks, registrations or purchases.
default.title: Connection

default.description: Congratulations, your wallet has been created! Click on the button below to activate it and receive your winnings.
default.title: Activation

default.description: To complete, authorize this transaction in your wallet. This ensures secure processing.
default.title: Transaction

default.description: Please authenticate with your wallet to proceed securely. Your signature confirms your identity.
default.title: Authentication

invite.title: Invite friends, earn $5
invite.text: Earn $5 for each friend you invite. T&C apply

pendingReferral.success: You have claimed your reward successfully!
pendingReferral.text: You got {{eurClaimable}} EUR pending thanks to your referral activities!
pendingReferral.title: Pending referral reward

recovery.title: Recover a wallet
recovery.needCreatePasskey: You need to create a new passkey on your device
recovery.successful: Recovery is successful, you can now <pLink>login</pLink>

recoverySetup.disclaimer:
Warning
- We do not store any information related to your wallet recovery.
- You are solely responsible for keeping your recovery file and password secure and private.
- The recovery file can be generated now, but the actual recovery process will only be available one week after the file is created to prevent malicious usage.
recoverySetup.title: Recovery setup

button.create: Create your wallet * in a second with biometry
button.error: Error during registration, please try again

register.notice: <sup>*</sup>encrypted digital account where you can find all the content you own, your consumption data and the rewards you earn

welcome.title: Welcome in your wallet
